short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a league-wide scoreboard on the ESPN Scoreboard Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly view how your ESPN Fantasy Football Team is doing compared to the rest of your league!

With ESPN Fantasy Football League Scoreboard, a chart will be inserted every time you visit the Scoreboard tab. From there, you can sort by the current points for the week, or the projected points for the week. As you players earn points, watch the Scoreboard change in real time.
